00022                 // Struct for controlling smooth interpolation of an Emitter member variable.
00023                 struct MemberController
00024                 {
00025                         float time;
00026                         bstype speed;
00027                 };

00029                 // Stores an instance of an Emitter, and structures for controlling its variables.
00030                 struct EmitterInstance
00031                 {
00032                         Emitter* emitter;
00033                         bstype special[NUM_SPECIAL_MEMBERS];
00034 
00035                         MemberController controllers[NUM_SPECIAL_MEMBERS];

00037                 };

00039                 // Event structure, contains a pointer to a shared CodeRecord which contains the
00040                 // bytecode for this event.
00041                 struct Event
00042                 {
00043                         String name;
00044                         int numArguments;
00045                         CodeRecord* code;
00046                 };
